codingQuestions.title: Reverse Array
codingQuestions.description:
An array is a data structure that stores elements of the same type in a contiguous block of memory. In an array, A, of size N, each memory location has some unique index, i (where 0 ≤ i < N), that can be referenced as A[i] or Ai.

Your task is to reverse an array of integers.
constraints: 1 ≤ A[i] ≤ 10^4, where A[i] is the i-th integer in A
